dict.string: Displays information about your laptop battery
Displays information about your battery, retrieving...

ioreg -l -n AppleSmartBattery -r > info.txt CURRENT_CAPACITY=$(cat info.txt | grep CurrentCapacity | awk '{printf ("%i", $3)}') MAX_CAPACITY=$(cat info.txt | grep MaxCapacity | awk '{printf ("%i", $3)}') DESIGN_CAPACITY=$(cat info.txt | grep DesignCapacity | awk '{printf ("%i", $3)}')
HEALTH=$(echo $MAX_CAPACITY $DESIGN_CAPACITY | awk '{printf ("%i", $1/$2 * 100)}') CHARGE=$(echo $CURRENT_CAPACITY $MAX_CAPACITY | awk '{printf ("%i", $1/$2 * 100)}') CELLS=$(python -c "f='●'*($CHARGE/10) + '○'*(10-$CHARGE/10);print f")
CYCLE_COUNT=$(cat info.txt | grep -e '"CycleCount" =' | awk '{printf ("%i", $3)}')
TIME_TO_EMPTY=$(cat info.txt | grep -i AvgTimeToEmpty | awk '{printf("%s", $3)}') TIME_LEFT=Calculating… if [ $TIME_TO_EMPTY -lt 15000 ]; then TIME_LEFT=$(cat info.txt | grep -i AvgTimeToEmpty | awk '{printf("%i:%.2i", $3/60, $3%60)}') fi
TIME_INFO=n STATUS_INFO=Draining
CHARGING=$(cat info.txt | grep -i ischarging | awk '{printf("%s",$3)}') if [ $CHARGING == Yes ]; then TIME_FULL=$(cat info.txt | grep -i AvgTimeToFull | tr '\n' ' | ' | awk '{printf("%i:%.2i", $3/60, $3%60)}') TIME_INFO=$(echo $TIME_FULL until full) STATUS_INFO=Charging else FULLY_CHARGED=$(cat info.txt | grep -i FullyCharged | awk '{printf("%s",$3)}') EXTERNAL=$(cat info.txt | grep -i ExternalConnected | awk '{printf("%s",$3)}') if [ $FULLY_CHARGED == Yes ]; then if [ $EXTERNAL == Yes ]; then TIME_INFO=$(echo On AC power) STATUS_INFO=Fully Charged else TIME_INFO=$(echo $TIME_LEFT) fi else TIME_INFO=$(echo $TIME_LEFT) fi fi
cat << EOB <?xml version="1.0"?> <items> <item uid=""> <title>$CHARGE% $CELLS</title> <subtitle>Current charge</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item> <item uid=""> <title>$TIME_INFO</title> <subtitle>Time left</subtitle> <icon>clock.png</icon> </item> <item uid=""> <title>$STATUS_INFO</title> <subtitle>Battery status</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item> <item uid=""> <title>$CYCLE_COUNT</title> <subtitle>Charge cycles completed</subtitle> <icon>cycles.png</icon> </item> <item uid=""> <title>$HEALTH%</title> <subtitle>Battery health</subtitle> <icon>health.png</icon> </item> </items> EOB
